string.text: {=929Lxhde}You will lose {INFLUENCE_COST} influence if you abandon the army.
{=1AcoIQVl}You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
{=OBXNbvkK}As you attempt to force the villagers to give you supplies, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
{=ySlVPZyF}As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
{=ZxcnmaXi}You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. You do not meet any resistance. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
{=aUNYlvbN}You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you.
{=7zaMwF08}While you were raiding {SETTLEMENT}, {PARTY} came to aid the village. You decided to...
{=6Bk1YjS4}As you attempt to force the villagers to give you supplies, some of the residents gather to resist you.
{=gfQmYDRq}As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you.
{=agkgu85j}You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to lay siege to it.
{=rGNrtXSx}You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to help defend the settlement from attackers.
{=qNgjr719}The force besieging {SETTLEMENT} has begun its assault!
{=fAEvWw8z}The defenders have pulled back and are mounting a last stand inside the keep.
{=trRLa9pi}You have encountered {PARTY}. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
{=g7zo28KR}You have encountered {PARTY}. They have no chance against your overwhelming power, and they surrender.
{=mSPDO0Fe}You are trapped by enemies. You are not in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
{=pn9KNMxb}You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
{=4ol7MhA5}You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight.
{=anrHk7ea}{PARTY} is leading the attack on the enemy. You'll be joining {?ARMY_COMMANDER_GENDER}her{?}him{\?} with your troops.
{=MFLAvq4Z}There are bandits inside this place. Do you want to attack them?
{=OdFPHvtE}Rebels are attacking this settlement. Do you want to interfere?

{=7fjOwwVH}Sure, I'll give you a tip. I spoke to some traders who say they just bought some {.%}{ITEM_NAME}{.%} from {SETTLEMENT} at a price of {BUY_COST}{GOLD_ICON} and sold at {DESTINATION} for {SELL_COST}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=xycMiCIq}I have not found any profitable trades recently.
{=7mRN2br0}Leadership of the formation has been given to {HERO_NAME}.
{=hEWuE0Ch}You're the commander. You will be able to order all formations during the battle.
{=Tyc4aAdz}Join the battle without leading any men.
{=YevUiidU}Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
{=alEG3BOa}Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
{=YbB2IpTR}Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
{=TxeKpK3Y}Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
{=ogtgc69b}You have been awarded the right to carry a banner. Your banner will signify your status and bring you honour. Which banner do you want to choose?
{=9zpZRkYz}Boosting a project adds +{BOOST} construction and costs {COST} denars / day.
{=PE4nuMc7}This page explains the game concepts in Bannerlord
{=cXnQaNfe}There is no effect on decision making.
{=zruLFJDG}Defending settlements has a higher weight in decisions. The party will also pursue enemies for a shorter distance.
{=Ma0PyWAC}Raiding, attacking parties and sieging have a higher weight in decisions. The party will pursue enemies farther.
{=OIBpCGYv}This party will shrink in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
{=eMsA4Vk0}This party will grow in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
{=m9vD3VlN}This party will NOT grow or shrink in size. It will try to keep it's size as it is.
{=izKWEAbY}Clan Does Not Have Any Additional Incomes
{=g6J4Oe6z}Clan name needs to be between {MIN} - {MAX} characters.
{=BxeU4zMb}There is already another clan with this name.
{=ZnsseELq}Faction name needs to be between {MIN} - {MAX} characters.
{=LpVaZbRS}There is already another kingdom with this name.
{=DGOgsMfx}{PRISONER.NAME} has been released after {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} ransom was paid.
{=Hvw3uSNN}{PRISONER.NAME} has been freed after {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} captors were defeated in battle.
{=gCaT2BTu}{PRISONER.NAME} has been released from captivity following a peace treaty.
{=gE7QFy6y}{PRISONER.NAME} has escaped from {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} place of captivity.
{=cXnQaNfe}There is no effect on decision making.
{=qzRbMK8G}Your vassals will be more inclined to take defensive actions against this enemy such as responding to enemy raids and sieges.
{=BixmxJPX}Your vassals will be more inclined to take offensive actions against this enemy such as raids and sieges.
{=VHjIJGja}You need to be in a kingdom
{=xWydBJyS}Rebels in {SETTLEMENT} have risen against their lord, {RULER}.
{=S9tmCkHz}This hero is clearing a common area.
{=sa2TQu1G}This hero is busy with an issue or a quest.
{=rZ9aqmaq}There is a better target. We should go there.
{=fMh5KZfk}There is no need for us to stay here. Let's go!
{=dcV0iOYB}Gather your troops and prepare for battle!
{=bAHNQGAw}Our allies need help. Lift the siege!
{=aqCj9dhC}There is no need to stay on the defense. Siege their settlements!
{=6kqK0kUn}There is no need to stay on the defense. Patrol the area.
{=XaCbpDUv}We should patrol this area for a while.
{=pJBz7hhl}Gather your men, we have another job to do!
{=EzrK2tnA}You cannot manage your army while in battle
{=ZuRzP6kF}You cannot gather an army while in battle
{=eKwhGmbI}After this troop gains {XP_AMOUNT} xp, one more troop will be available for upgrade
{=1XE7yeaP}After this prisoner gains {CONFORMITY_AMOUNT} conformity, one more prisoner will be available for recruitment.
{=1XVvU23F}Unable to use the clipboard text as body properties key!
{=1KcIeYe2}You need to be in the same location as the character in order to talk to them
{=wXQUXa1P}You cannot give anymore focus points to this skill
{=S3ymfdwB}You have made changes. Do you want to apply them?
{=FdTd3yIx}Changes you made cannot be applied. Do you want to reset and change the screen?
{=D5QlXOV0}Critical Fail and Fail Whole Persuasion Chance
{=Ti2GeG0U}Upon selection, this option will block one random option.
{=XqV3x4i3}Upon selection, this option will progress the persuasion attempt to the next stage.
{=sfcbd6QS}You've scored {CURRENT_PROGRESS} points out of the {TARGET_PROGRESS} needed to succeed in this persuasion attempt.
{=bg8co4he}Slaughter{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.
{=1dLZLQsY}Donate to Troops{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.
{=J5961cx8}You will slow down dramatically. Be careful.
{=b778BvfW}This item is {PERCENTAGE}% more expensive than average
{=kX8svveF}This item's cost is near it's average price
{=9gNjg4P0}This will not save your game and return you the the Main Menu. Are you sure you want to exit?
{=HQgSPtK6}Are you sure you want to exit multiplayer?
{=hbeUbpEA}Are you sure you want to cancel?
{=eyMU7X0e}You're a lord and voting. The ruler will vote in the end and decide the outcome.
{=M6tfHhq7}You have voted and the ruler has decided on the outcome.
{=qe686AAn}You're the ruler. Your decision will be the final one and will overrule anything.
{=l4uTnJct}You need to select an outcome and how much you want to support that outcome.
{=baIUUw1c}Spend your own influence to increase the influence of the selected clan
{=Igoid3sR}Propose to expel this clan from the kingdom ({SUPPORT}%)
{=FRZfpryn}Bring forward the proposal to give this settlement to someone else
{=COhJ2HsU}It will be automatically resolved in {HOUR} hours.
{=DyarV8i7}There is already a proposed decision for this policy.
{=v3cY44N1}You cannot annex a ruling clan's settlement.
{=aepux62p}You can not annex a settlement until ownership decision is complete.
{=5kS1qjZL}There is already an unresolved decision on this settlement.
{=mGWrSJLE}You cannot disband an army while it's in a map event.
{=NBv29XpJ}You cannot disband an army while you're in that army.
{=21t7Ev03}You can not perform this action while you are imprisoned.
{=5a4cY5az}You can not perform this action while you are in a siege.
{=debCJDAZ}You can not perform this action while you are in an encounter
{=GNGTllPc}You can not perform this action while raiding a village
{=04GuLxE1}You cannot change the leader of your own party or disband it
{=ID8wnSIi}This action is not allowed in current stage of the story.
{=QmaVRAkx}You could not pay all wages, your party loses {reg1} morale.

{=EvvMNX3A}The starting player chooses one of four pawns to be removed from the board.{newline}Then, the other player selects one of his adjacant pawns to also be removed. If the pawn of the starting player was in the center, the other player has to remove one of two pawns in the center too.{newline}{newline}The game now begins.
{=MmNF7sW7}Moving pawns is only possible by capturing pawns from your opponent.{newline}Capturing is done by orthoginally jumping over 1 or more opposing pawns.
{=5WWbQRQ5}A player wins if his opponent can't make any more jumps (captures).
{=snxLc1Wq}Two pawns from each player start on the board as shown. Players take turns placing the rest on any available tile, excluding the center tile.

{=AWW0T6xR}A pawn may be moved orthogonally, one tile at a time.{newline}A pawn can not be moved back to the tile that it came from in the previous turn.{newline}If a player is unable to move, that player may remove one of the opponent's pawns and still make a move.

{=c3cdHImi}Capture your opponent's pawns by surrounding them on both sides. If a pawn moves in between two opposing pawns, it does not get captured.{newline}In the first two images, white pawns get captured by the black pawns. In the last two, there are no captures.

{=x2mSJAVa}A player wins if his opponent has only one or no pawns left.{newline}{newline}Another way to win is by constructing a barrier that has all of the pawns of the opposing player on one side. When a barrier has been constructed, the player with the most pawns left wins.

{=YYdPfXEP}Tablut is a game of attackers (black) versus defenders (white).{newline}The attackers outnumber the defenders, but the defenders don't have to capture to win. Their main objective is to secure their king (center pawn).{newline}The king follows the same movement and capturing rules as the other pawns.

{=GbbGlcMZ}Pawns can move to any tile in a vertical or horizontal direction, but they can never jump over other pawns.{newline}Pawns can not move on or over the center tile. Once the king leaves this tile, he can also no longer cross it.

{=1asbVsat}Capturing is done by surrounding an opposing pawn from both sides with your own pawns.{newline}Pawns can also be captured by blocking them against the center tile. This works for both players.
{=WTR5Lr8W}The defenders win when they can move their king to any edge of the board.{newline}The attackers win when they capture the king, or if they can prevent all defenders from moving.
{=xv8T0Il8}The starting player and the amount of tiles you can move each turn are decided by throwing four two-coloured sticks.
{=09ooh9I3}Pawns travel toward the opponent's home-tile. Upon reaching the last tile, they will move back towards their own home-tile. Enemy pawns can be captured along the way.

{=MwgcfGsr}A pawn that lands on a tile with an opposing pawn already there, will capture that opposing pawn. The captured pawn will be stacked underneath the invading pawn.{newline}A stack of pawns can be also be re-captured as long as the top pawn belongs to the opponent.{newline}As soon as a pawn makes a capture, it will move back towards its home-tile in the next turn.

{=kRKYHQ6V}When a stack lands exactly on its home-tile, all pawns of the player who controls the stack are returned to that player's hand, and can be re-used. The pawns belonging to the other player are eliminated from the game.
{=ZXXNrvvg}A player wins if his opponent has no more available pawns in hand or on the board.

{=aNSAaHk9}Bagh Chal is a game of Sheep (white) versus Wolves (black).{newline}The wolves have four pawns that start on the four corners of the board. Every turn, one sheep is placed on the board, and one wolf makes a move or capture until all sheep have been placed on the board.{newline}After all sheep have been placed, the sheep can now also move on the board.
{=Lc1vIEnM}Wolves and sheep move in the same way by sliding along the lines on the board, one tile per turn.
{=EPGDe5fG}Only wolves can capture, by jumping over a sheep to an available tile behind it. Capturing also follows the lines on the board.
{=zo5hQfll}The wolves win if they can remove 5 sheep from the board.{newline}{newline}The sheep win if they can block the wolves so they can't make any more moves.

{=bWVG2s2h}You can only move a pawn that has an opposing pawn next to it, to the center tile.{newline}Every pawn can freely be moved one tile along the outer edge.{newline}A pawn on the center tile can move to any available tile.
{=yzIOcJoK}A player wins if his opponent has been blocked and can no longer make any moves.
{=VeqwXwYc}Enemies are fleeing. You won the battle.
{=d4n8AuUh}Friendly troops are fleeing. You've lost the battle.
{=tQDbRfMs}We were separated in the heat of battle
{=fRu5Y4OT}I was wounded and left for dead
{=gT5zJaD7}I was knocked senseless by the enemy
{=ugX2RRDY}I was taken and held for ransom
{=D8Wjbw9K}I got captured, but later managed to escape
{=pSz4xSqO}Hero's {SKILL_NAME} skill needs to be {MIN_SKILL_AMOUNT} or higher.
{=ENzvOHsA}{ASKED_LORD.LINK} is in the field and {?ASKED_LORD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} should be close to {SETTLEMENT_NAME} at the moment.
{=DkaNhxpg}Are you sure you want to abdicate leadership?{?WILL_DESTROY}{newline}There are no other clans to take leadership. Your kingdom will be destroyed.{?}{\?}
{=LymKjMLk}Your men have just join your party
{=RKyiu5MH}Perhaps you and I can make a deal.
{=uhcIXeba}You are discarding items. Are you sure?
{=ZdeswYbM}Trader doesn't have enough money! Are you sure?
{=ylQJwqKH}You're leaving hard earned, free loot behind! Are you sure?
{=JQarnWiz}You don't have enough materials for this.
{=itLpRUtF}Clan doesn't have any empty party slots.
{=6OZycZbc}Clan doesn't have any available heroes to lead the new party.
{=HNqy4Ctc}Cannot kick a companion who is solving an issue.
{=BNAHlS9P}Are you sure? You won't be able to undo this action.
{=Xedhfj07}It would take {TRAVEL_DURATION} for {HERO_NAME} to arrive at your party. Do you want to proceed?
{=ehsuyvdT}If you proceed, the party will be without a leader for {TRAVEL_DURATION} while your clan members travel. It will not be able to join any armies until its new leader arrives. Are you sure?
{=9raxrECY}If you proceed, {LEADER.NAME} will be the new leader of this party. Are you sure?

{=AxRxT2Xj}Once a party is disbanded, it merges into a near clan party or goes to nearest map faction settlement and joins its garrison.{newline}{newline}You will not be able to undo / cancel this action.{newline}{newline}Are you sure?

{=OLZqZZF3}If you proceed, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will travel for {TRAVEL_DURATION} to become the new governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. While traveling, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will not be available and you will not be able to change the governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} until {GOVERNOR.NAME} arrives. Are you sure?
{=aBssWwIu}If you proceed, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will become the new governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
{=mJkJWccN}If you proceed, you will remove {GOVERNOR.NAME} from being the governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
{=hoebgN2u}If you proceed, selected clan members will start traveling and they will not be available until they arrive {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
{=3TXGG01D}You chose well, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. My lads know how to keep their word and earn their pay.[ib:convo_approving]
{=aaQtzfjL}Well done, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Keep the money and wine coming our way, and there's no foe in Calradia you need fear.[ib:convo_approving]
{=ygY1oKQD}We are at your service, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Point us in the direction of those who need hurting, and we'll do the rest.[ib:convo_approving]
{=kM1Y8XT0}You will not be dissapointed {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You will not find better warriors in all Calradia.[ib:convo_approving]
{=MeQmoYb4}You don't have a high enough relation to acquire this troop. {newline}You have {REL1}. You need {REL2}.
{=WHED64rw}A new troop will be available here after some time.
{=vZzDCjDr}Currently nobody is willing to be recruited in this town.
{=TNLRC4Gf}Fight with a one handed short weapon.
{=aJoNj6JX}Fight with a two handed short weapon.
{=CKGavOyA}Fight with a spear or similiar polearm, either one-handed or two handed.
{=f6gSyvnC}Shoot enemies with a bow and arrows. Perform difficult shots from a long distance.
{=T3JJ7aIV}Ride on the map with as much speed as possible. Fight on horseback gaining speed bonus.
{=eNQgzubm}Fight on foot. Move on map on foot.
{=W5gPypVY}Use smithy to create weapons, refine materials and smelt old weapons.
{=7cMUohRm}Command simulated battles. Win battles at difficult odds. Escape from encounters by sacrificing troops if necessary.
{=IbkODMHV}Spot tracks and hideouts. Travel through difficult terrain. (Scout)
{=OEax2Y9c}Raid caravans. Recruit and lead bandit troops. Infiltrate enemy towns. Give bribes. Escape from captivity.
{=HdTVkcII}Improve relations with people. Socialize with nobles. Do Barters.
{=JdNTRtpJ}Maintain high morale in your party. Assemble and lead armies. Upgrade your troops.
{=hVmamTJX}Gain party morale from food variety (Quartermaster). Improve settlement prosperity and build projects (Governor).
{=ozYRUrum} Help wounded soldiers heal in settlements.
{=a3hmB91k}Build and operate siege engines. Successfully use engines in sieges offensively or defensively.
{=nk0bADtq}You have rejected a challenge to a duel. Your army is disheartened by this display of cowardice. Your party loses morale.
{=pSjnd6PX}You have lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by your defeat. Your party loses morale.
{=bXS5KHk8}You have won the duel. Your army is encouraged by this display of your might. Your party gains morale.
{=HMgrtLYa}Your champion has lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by this defeat. Your party loses morale.
{=ROB0VcsI}Your champion has won the duel. Your army is encouraged by this victory. Your party gains morale.
{=OGjq7rpg}We are taking our products to the market at {TOWN}.
{=Zg5Zmgui}We are returning from the market at {TOWN} back to our village.
{=72Rasm5f}We have nothing - no silver, no wares.
{=bZJs2AQX}Here's our money: {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. And here's our wares: {ITEM_LIST}. Just take them and let us live, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
{=GDugjWao}Here is {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. Just take it and let us go.
{=7MWaMaez}Here's what we've got: {ITEM_LIST}. Take them, but let us live.
{=c7bVbjD7}As you wish. From now on, we fight for you.

{=a5j1v7tM}We've heard what happened to others who refused to join your cause. We've no desire to end up like them and no means to fight you. We'll wear your colors from now until it pleases you no more.
{=h6AJXR2e}Are you sure to retreat your party?
{=YMIFqVOk}Are you sure you want to surrender? All of your troops will be lost!
{=OtP3heba}You've beaten your opponent and won the game!
{=caFEBWSY}Your opponent has bested you. You've lost.
{=gAX49b7b}You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
{=RO0a71EP}Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
{=TDQId8c9}You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, and have more pawns left. You win the game!
{=J3ACAwbt}Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have more pawns left. You win the game!
{=5lDYh7wJ}You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but have fewer pawns left. You lost the game!
{=77SdNt8C}Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, and you have fewer pawns left. You lost the game!
{=Uaw5VF3D}Your opponent wants to forfeit. Do you accept your win? If you don't, you will continue playing.
{=wZnsFoQ6}I don't think we have met properly my friend. You just saved my life out there, and I still don't know your name...
{=GNkrUdwb}Your help was most welcome stranger. My name is {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}. Can I learn yours?
{=yUo269Us}Thanks for your help, stranger. We haven't met properly yet, have we? What is your name?
{=hmlUJaDa}Well met indeed {PLAYER.LINK}. My name is {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} and I am forever in your debt. If there is ever anything I can help you with, just let me know...
{=U8TPlwW9}Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am in your debt for what you just did. I hope one day I will find a way to repay it.
{=jCbYaCcg}Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}. Thanks for your help and I hope we meet again.
{=hzflo2kJ}Again you save our necks, {PLAYER.LINK}! Truly, you are the best of friends.
{=bMjtFIba}You arrived just in the nick of time! {PLAYER.LINK}. You have my deepest thanks!
{=wdsJRYRn}You turned up just in time, {PLAYER.LINK}. I will not forget your help.

{=evuR5kwf}Rumour has it the {ITEM_NAME} around here sells for cheaper than in other towns. If you were to buy some here and take it to {TOWN_NAME}, where it fetches a higher price, you could probably make around {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} of profit per item.
{=iKzyJHiD}Sorry, I don't know of any good trading tips at present.

{=LL6GkIfg}If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents, {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents, and {PRIZE_4}{GOLD_ICON} if you can survive long enough to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last fighter standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_5}{GOLD_ICON}. Sounds good, eh?[if:convo_nonchalant]

{=agIbuP9a}Heh! That's quite the bruise you're sporting. But don't worry; everybody gets trounced once in a while. The important thing is to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and keep fighting. That's what champions do.

{=o7I8qayN}Ha! Nothing like a good jab in the gut to let you know you're alive, eh? Looks like you managed to take down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Not bad. But that won't bring you any prize money. Now, if I were you, I would go back there and show everyone what I can do...

{=dxtuFW8b}You put up quite a good fight there. Some very good moves. A few errors, sure, but you definitely show promise. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON} for knocking down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents.

{=923438xA}Nice, {PLAYER.LINK}, nice. You managed to take down no less than {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. You were a crowd favorite, for your pluck. And of course, you earned a prize money of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=EUmwEtap}That was fine fighting, {PLAYER.LINK}. You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Of course you deserve a prize with that performance: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}. Nice, eh?
{=V0OMMQ1F}A magisterial performance, {PLAYER.LINK}. Whack! Crack! You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} of them. The crowd loved it. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=pQ9Sxily}Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! As the last one standing, you of course win the top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=MWGATOoz}The tournament will be a melee group fight.
{=IwpFM2CJ}The tournament will be a horse race.
{=zNHtgL0S}The tournament will be an archery contest.
{=L7qKijnE}{ITEM_NAME}, won by {COMPANION.LINK} has been added to your inventory.
{=taaNCsVZ}You win the tournament by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} in the final round.
{=rmSkXZlp}The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} wins by beating you in the final round.
{=YxKHEUEX}The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round. You were eliminated at round {TOURNAMENT_ELIMINATED_ROUND}.
{=OGxk0EXC}The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round.
{=FD9abtTo}If you wager 100 and win, you will get {NORMALIZED_EXPECTED_GOLD}
{=H9y9dLao}You can wager gold to increase the prize you take. Every round, the odds will be different and you can wager {MAX_AMOUNT} each time.

{=SwY4YLMY}The Dragon Banner stands tall once again.
{=FuYivUV1}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you pledged allegiance to {RULER.NAME}, hoping that {?RULER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} will lead the fight to {?PLAYER_WANTS_RESTORE}restore{?}defeat{\?} the Empire.
{=36hbMBhb}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the {FORMAL_NAME} was destroyed. It will not fulfil its destiny to {?PLAYER_WANTS_RESTORE}restore{?}destroy{\?} the Empire as you had hoped.
{=5lT70YJY}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you heard rumors of a secret pact being forged between the rival imperial factions so that they can combine their forces against the enemies of the empire.
{=0rsySqR6}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you heard of a conspiracy working in the shadows to forge the enemies of the Empire into an alliance.
{=MWatMKoP}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the secret pact between the imperial factions was revealed, as the armies of the former rivals took the field together.
{=E0lb2Z2r}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the conspiracy against the Empire succeeded in uniting its foes, as the armies of {FACTION_NAMES} took the field together.
{=GralaKWi}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, a child was born to {FATHER_NAME} and {MOTHER_NAME}.
{=YeaFZzXS}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, {LEADER_NAME} declared the creation of a new realm, the {KINGDOM_NAME}.
{=t1hYTrMR}On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, a realm fell. The {FORMAL_NAME} is no more.

{=J7DnK8Kv}Today's not your lucky day, friend. How about you hand over your silver? Be a real shame to have to cut anyone's throat.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=Pc0zpaGa}Aye, what have we here? There's a tax for passage in these parts, traveler, paid either in coin or in blood.[if:convo_bared_teeth]
{=kdV0tx9K}Hello, traveler. Hope you brought your purse. See, we're what you might call brigands, and I'm afraid we can't let you pass without paying us a bit of coin.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=EZLs7hLL}You! Stop! Give us your silver. We're not playing games.[if:convo_angry]
{=gOSpzTrt}Stop right there. This is a robbery.[if:convo_aggressive]
{=SdcpdfaV}Hey - you. What you got in your bags? What are you carrying?[if:convo_bared_teeth]
{=KC5AZohd}Greetings, traveler. Welcome to our forest. We're going to have to collect a small toll.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=1Zq8mzzJ}Well now. Let's see what sort of fly has stumbled into our web.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=VpKIzJxz}Well there, traveller. We've just made landfall in these lands, hoping for a bit of luck with the raiding and pillaging, and aren't you a sight for sore eyes?[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=OqCodBZJ}Stop there you dog! Show us what you've got!
{=aJXhsjmT}Greetings, traveller. Unless you wish your bones to be left in the sand to be gnawed upon by jackals, give us what we want.
{=QA8Gm9PY}A hot day, is it not? Don't tire yourself fighting. Give us what we want and we'll leave.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=k8ocninL}Stop there - easy now. The great eternal sky has given these lands to us. No one passes through here without our permission.
{=MHJCuM3N}Halt! Your foreign feet on this sacred land offend our ancestors. What are we going to do about that?[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=m2YKBbdI}Hello there, little lost sheep. We are wolves of the mountains, and we would like a moment of your time...[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
{=btil6Rdb}What have we here? Looks like the mountain spirits have answered our prayers, and granted us success in the hunt.
{=6dNTZdPf}Stop there, in the name of the free men of the mountain! Now, what have you got for us?
{=t6xdCj43}Oh, indeed we can, indeed we can. Provided you have a fat purse and are ready to lighten it, of course.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
{=uCikaIoq}Splendid. See, my lads and I, we're not cruel men. A bit greedy though, that can't be denied, so do be generous.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
{=cRMgjRMP}Good, good. I much prefer a straight-up deal to rummaging through your gut afterward to see what you might have hid there.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
{=0IjUokET}How much? How much money? Be quick.[ib:hip][rf:convo_angry]
{=kx8ZfaST}All right. So how much do you value your life?[ib:hip][if:convo_bared_teeth]
{=O69Vhqxk}So how much are you going to give us?[rf:convo_angry]
{=WYfjyuHj}Well then... It was a long voyage, so do dig deep into your purse.
{=4WD0kJSR}Arrr.. You'd best not be toying with us.
{=wtDdqXGW}Well, I'm glad you respect our ancient and sacred privileges.
{=5T7nyzda}I am glad to hear that. Killing is thirsty work for us too.
{=4rRsmX8i}Good. Sometimes it's better to shear the sheep than eat them.
{=lfMgaBiJ}Make it worth our while not to kill you.
{=3l8HsbHK}Heh. You made a wise choice. Come back this way and we can do business again.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
{=79cOhac4}That'll do. For now, anyway. Travel safe - and I hope to see you again.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
{=qaueUlAp}Good. Now be careful out there. World's full of thieves, not all of them as kind as we are.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
{=yeEaBV29}We'll take it. You can live. Now go before I change my mind.[ib:closed][if:convo_normal]
{=ZuLa12aT}That's the spirit... We're a band of bastards that you really don't want to mess with.[rf:convo_bemused]
{=bdQBpUba}So kind you are, not sending us home empty-handed.
{=ONGv27TH}Now out of my sight, you mangy cringing cur!
{=KTGG9EgL}Safe journeys! Don't let yourself get robbed by anyone but us!
{=RzjMX0Og}Good. Now be on your way. Don't forget to drink lots of water!
{=QBbBahLv}You have our permission to proceed with your journey.
{=hDktLs4a}You have acted wisely and with respect. You may go.
{=b7bWCXbk}Run along now, little sheep. And be careful of the other wolfpacks out there.
{=xsIU28Za}Nice! No more sleeping on hard cold rock and dining on stringy squirrel.
{=TSw4tD02}Really? I suppose I'll be getting my hands dirty today, then.[ib:aggressive][if:convo_bared_teeth]
{=9esIWdDC}Afraid we'll need to make an example out of you, then. Don't bother begging for mercy.[ib:aggressive][if:convo_bared_teeth]
{=FLrzc1uk}Ah, I'm afraid we'll have to cut your throat then - on principle, of course. For trespassing.
{=TgtdcMGS}A fly that wiggles and struggles a bit - we can handle that..
{=3fAm8FaM}So be it... As my father says, a journey's not worthy of the name if you don't to kill anyone.
{=MpDMaBE9}Defy us, will you? We'll drink from your skull!
{=xZxbFuDI}The jackals will feed well tonight, then.
{=asHzEWnG}We shall stain the sands with your blood, then.
{=zX4C3332}You shall be slain, then. Ready yourself.
{=KGHlXL8H}Very well - we shall cleanse this land with your blood.
{=PMnSk81U}So you intend to fight, little sheep? Let's see your horns then.
{=RNQIG1DS}Hear that whistling and howling? That's not the wind - it's the ghosts of those who defied us. Prepare to join them.
{=H4rAiNlf}You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on yourself and you won the fight. Here is your reward {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=MGv4Uabd}You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on yourself but you have been defeated.
{=vLU6nNwp}You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on {FIGHTER_NAME} and {?FIGHTER_GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won the fight. Here is your reward {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
{=Qg5suamT}You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on {FIGHTER_NAME} but {?FIGHTER_GENDER}she{?}he{\?} has been defeated.
{=gj2HD7M3}You still have a chance to win. Do you want to forfeit?
{=HmbvM9Na}Do you want to skip current match?

{NEWLINE}Brings the attackers to the same height as the wall and evens the odds against defenders.
{=7vrdpDFK}Mangonel{NEWLINE}Throws rocks over a distance using torsion strings.{NEWLINE}Equally effective against walls, enemy siege engines and their operators.
{=893hzVCQ}Fire Mangonel{NEWLINE}Throws jars filled with Greek fire, combines the already deadly power of mangonels with fire.

{=lQQPKo02}Move to screen us against foes moving behind our back

{=ZPaw3WuO}The Vlandians are the descendants of adventurers from the west who lived under the Empire for centuries before forming an independent kingdom. With the decline of imperial authority, they have evolved into a well organised feudal society led by a caste of warlike nobles who prefer to fight with spears and lances on horseback.

{=c1Ag8YJS}The Battanians still remember the olden days when the woods stretched across northern Calradia, and the Empire and its cities had yet to violate their sanctity. The fierce warriors remain loyal to their traditional ways. They paint their faces when going to battle and even their noblemen prefer to fight on foot while using great axes and two-handed swords with deadly efficiency.

{=HkZ4E94O}The Khuzait confederation of steppe tribes used to live a nomadic life, but have recently settled in the eastern frontier of the Empire and are slowly transitioning into an agrarian society with permanent town centers. Despite this, they still retain many aspects of their nomadic life, including their affinity with horses. They are masters of mounted archery, shooting and then galloping out of reach.

{=HD2wzAxz}Sturgians are the descendants of the foreign tribes of northern Calradia. As the empire expanded into their cold forests, they found a ready market for the luxurious furs of woodland animals whom they traditionally hunted and trapped. Sturgian chieftains became princes, vying for pre-eminence with the help of Nord mercenaries who migrated into their realm. They are good hunters and wanderers, travelling far in search of opportunities both for trade and for plunder.

{=Khr5yETv}The Aserai are the inhabitants of the Nahasa desert, a mixture of nomadic bedouin and settled oasis farmers. They are famous for their horsemanship and their knowledge of the learning of many lands, especially medicine, gained from lying on some of the continent's most lucrative trade routes. Each clan is fiercely proud of its lineage and often jealous of the others, but when united by a charismatic leader, they become a major force in the south.

{=iLEhyGI8}The Calradian Empire is in decline. Even before the suspicious death of the Emperor Arenicos, the once united realm was torn by political rivalries. Today, those factions are in open war. Yet Calradians endure. Their methodical study of defensive strategy, in which garrison cities slow down invading forces until mobile field armies can come to their rescue, helps hold their neighbors at bay.
{=1PwQxaOu}Preparations seem to be underway for a tournament
{=8bSHlWBL}There is no tournament currently in this town.
{=7MSuWxaY}{CHILD.NAME} has reached the age of {CHILD.AGE} and {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} needs your guidance.

{=SRYuaoh1}This region is gripped by civil disorder, yet people must still go about their daily chores. For the most part, they not linger long in the markets or make eye contact. But you overhear hushed conversations about the rebels in the countryside. Some seem to be afraid of the rebels, others secretly thrilled that the tables have turned, even for a little while, on the rich and powerful.
{=Bg83jhCR}The town is clearly going through hard times. People look malnourished and buildings are poorly maintained.
{=qgL4P2vO}The town is prosperous. The people look well-fed and relatively comfortable.
{=OiCCv0EL}The village is going through hard times. Farm tools are rusty and broken. Brush and weeds are reclaiming the outermost fields.
{=8cY08v3s}The village is of average wealth. Humans and animals alike look well-fed. Villagers busily attend to the tasks of the seasons.
{=g1KLcfxT}The village is prosperous. Brimming sacks of grain, healthy animals and loaded carts testify to the bounty of the fields.
{=9Bm06EEJ}You hear much praise for the wisdom of the rulers who have achieved this prosperity.
{=9PLNQrWw}You hear few complaints and people seem to have confidence in the authorities.
{=7AOOQ5iB}Despite the hardship, you hear few murmurs of complaint, and people seem to trust their rulers to lead them through adversity.
{=Zw60OTJe}Mostly people are content, although you hear some complaints about rising prices, the unequal distribution of wealth, and migrants coming from the countryside.
{=qR0s1VvE}You hear some complaints about prices, shortages and greedy merchants, but no more than normal.
{=P8BxiiKd}Despite the poverty, you hear few words of complaint, as though people are too beaten down to expect any change.

{=KZAQHSa2}Yet the prosperity is clearly not benefiting everyone equally. People seem angry, complaining endlessly about new rural migrants, rising prices, and those who are profiting more than others.
{=6bex2HUl}Though it seems most people are managing to get by, many seem angry, and you overhear a few passers-by muttering that their patience is giving out. You sense something may be stirring.
{=bzrOHiS8}People openly curse the authorities, as though they feel they have nothing to lose.

{=uUlO8l6M}Heard you got into a fight with some of the people working for {COMMON_AREA_OWNER}. Well, that's no business of mine.
{=kRraos2Z}You caused trouble on my territory... I didn't care for that.

{=pJR9zz06}Troops that are ready to upgrade are marked with a special icon.{newline}{newline}Some troops may have two possible upgrade paths.

{=vdEoBkpr}You must maintain food supplies at all times. If you run out of food, your party will lose morale. Your troops may desert you because of low morale.{newline}{newline}You can see your food reserve on the info bar. Hover over it to see how much food your party consumes each day. Since your party needs food, go to marketplace now to purchase some.
{=QVChn4mG}Food items are also trade goods. You can find trade goods easily with the "Miscellaneous" filter.
{=iOLa5rjZ}Grain is usually the cheapest food you can buy.{newline}{newline}Other types of food may grant various bonuses when consumed.{newline}{newline}Buy some food now.

{=bZOVbBRG}When your skill points reach a required threshold, one or more perks will become available.{newline}{newline}This will be notified by a small indicator over the character screen button.{newline}{newline}Click on the character button to view available perk choices.

{=TZZaO7iI}When your skill points reach a required threshold, one or more perks will become available.{newline}{newline}This will be notified by a small indicator over the character screen button.{newline}{newline}Press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the character button to view available perk choices.
{=uWEUYE1m}You can choose an available perk by clicking on its button.
{=pKtXgb6b}You can choose an available perk by pressing {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on its button.
{=hZ9eNwFZ}Perks usually become available in pairs.{newline}{newline}Each one grants different bonuses so choose wisely.

{=E9f8YUbO}You gain a level every time your total skill points total reaches a target value. Leveling up grants focus points to spend.{newline}{newline}If you have free focus points you will see it by a small indicator over the character screen button. Click on the button to review different skills and choose one to increase focus.

{=N8YVPdBw}You gain a level every time your total skill points total reaches a target value. Leveling up grants focus points to spend.{newline}{newline}If you have free focus points you will see it by a small indicator over the character screen button. Press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the character button to review different skills and choose one to increase focus.
{=k9QvIYaR}Focus points are used to increase the learning rate at any skill.

{=e54212r1}In towns, you can find talented individuals that can aid you.{newline}{newline}These potential companions can be found hanging out in taverns.{newline}{newline}Go to tavern district now to find a potential companion.
{=WBupKtnu}You can see portraits of Important NPCs on the top bar.{newline}{newline}Click on the portrait and choose talk from the menu.
{=0FssY1wG}You can see portraits of Important NPCs on the top bar.{newline}{newline}Press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on their portrait and choose talk from the menu.
{=JkVV4vUs}Click on the talk button to start conversation.
{=dIOOcbqU}Press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the talk button to start conversation.
{=Z7zWkAV8}You can ransom your prisoners off to the ransom broker.{newline}{newline}You can find him in the tavern area.
{=IjMel5eg}You can sell off all prisoners at once.{newline}{newline}Or you can engage with the ransom broker to pick them individually.
{=pftVKkgq}To keep track of a settlement on the campaign map, press the circle next to its name.

{=EvAriC6s}Every character in Calradia has two equipment sets. Characters use their military set when they are expecting trouble. You can switch between their sets using the buttons over the character's model. Note that most of the armors and weapons are unusable while in civilian set because the civilian set is used when it is inappropriate or forbidden for your character to be heavily armed.

{=DtKKtcws}Notice your party speed has dropped because you are carrying too much.{newline}You should reduce the amount of weight you carry to speed up.{newline}You can also increase your party's carrying capacity by recruiting more troops or buying horses and camels.
{=gKzLAjXr}Notice how your army cohesion has dropped to a low point, and it is more likely that your army will disperse.{newline}You can click on the army management button to boost your cohesion.

{=qjMhakoM}Notice how your army cohesion has dropped to a low point, and it is more likely that your army will disperse.{newline}You can press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the army management button to boost your cohesion.
{=xORASoex}You can click on "+" button to add 10 cohesion. Be aware that boosting it costs some influence.
{=JD7OlpIl}You can press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the "+" button to add 10 cohesion. Be aware that boosting it costs some influence.
{=VvpPbvpm}You can call other lords to your banner. Click on the highlighted army icon on the lower right to do so.
{=oKl1p2er}You can call other lords to your banner. Press {CONSOLE_ACTION_KEY} while the cursor is on the highlighted army icon on the lower right to do so.
{=bfIEbq8b}You can create an army by adding members from the list on the left. To finalize your choices, press "Done".
{=5RSfkx7d}Gathering of your army may take some time.
{=XAbeeOQo}You can weaken the enemy by raiding its villages. This looks like a good target to raid.
{=vt1IbBFt}You have spotted an enemy army. Be cautious of it.
{=v7HPTy2y}With a strong army at your behest, you can conquer an enemy castle or city. This looks like a good target to besiege.
{=b1BiRmgI}You are setting your siege camp. You have to wait for the preparations to be over.
{=zb9fiIP6}You can choose to build siege machines by using the squares for ranged engines and the circles for rams and siege towers.
{=fUNa6FAo}During battles, holding down {MISSION_INDICATORS_KEY} shows markers on enemy and allied formations.
{=77YzJbA2}Encyclopedia offers up-to-date information about settlements, heroes, clans, and factions. Select a category to see contents listed under the said category.
{=VMcd4nma}The Encyclopedia has information on all the towns, castles, and villages of Calradia. Once visited or revealed, you can track up-to-date information from the encyclopedia.
{=MCeCa7SE}Troop pages allow you to see the skills and equipment sets of the selected troop. Try investigating upgrade trees to plan your army composition ahead of time.
{=zF0xUaXd}Investigate kingdoms to keep up with the fiefs, clans, and wars of the kingdoms of the Calradia.
{=TVqGNr8b}Keeping up with Clans of Caldraia allows you to follow up on allies and foes alike. You can check their members, fiefs, and power levels upon reveal.
{=sYkqpuFx}Bannerlord has many different elements that affect the world of Calradia. You can always use filters to learn more about the game concepts.

{=GDPa0sQX}Tracking allows you to find the settlements on the world map. As long as the track button is active location selected settlements will be highlighted. You can click the point near the settlement text to disable tracking.
{=BV5gL8SK}If you know what or who you are looking for you can use the search bar and type in. The search bar lists all the persons, settlements, and troops of the Calradia.
{=JoYrhCGB}Trying to find something specific? Use filters on the left bar to narrow out the results.
{=1XkYGDEZ}The sorting menu lets you sort your results based on different variables.

{=rVaufuNb}You have opened a page where your character has very little information. Arriving at settlements and meeting people of interest related to this page will reveal more and up to date information.
